dct_title_s: The distances of places in Palestine reduced to roman miles
dct_description_sm: the whole carefully compiled with improvements by Thos. Bowen.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "English miles" and "Roman miles".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes (with distances), places of historical interest.
